title: LFP Gold - Plat
body: Looking for a duo partner gold -- plat to play with somewhat regularly from 4-7 weeknights (Sydney time), preferably starting today to boost my mmr before season reset. I've recently been tilted and am looking for someone to get me through these tough times. I main adc and can play decent mid as long as I stick to my mains, and don't mind whatever role you play. No voice chat.

replies.body:
Hey xtrememaster, I'm bubblecream. Sucks to hear you have been going through rough times. I totally feel ya.
I'm also keen to duo - I'm G3 and my strength is in the bot lane.
Add me if you're keen.
